languages.text: "Шантажа будет вполне достаточно. Если ты не будешь слушаться, я превращу тебя в материал для изобретений и удостоверюсь, что ты чувствуешь и осознаешь каждую манипуляцию, проводимую над твоей плотью. Но если ты проявишь покорность, я позволю тебе пожить еще немного".

"Coercion will be more than enough. If you disobey, I will turn you into material for my creations and ensure that you feel and are aware of every manipulation performed on your flesh. But if you do what I tell you to do, I will let you live for a while longer."
languages.original_text: "Шантажа будет вполне достаточно. Если ты не будешь слушаться, я превращу тебя в материал для изобретений и удостоверюсь, что ты чувствуешь и осознаешь каждую манипуляцию, проводимую над твоей плотью. Но если ты проявишь покорность, я позволю тебе пожить еще немного".

traits.locale_text: "Coercion will be more than enough. If you disobey, I will turn you into material for my creations and ensure that you feel and are aware of every manipulation performed on your flesh. But if you do what I tell you to do, I will let you live for a while longer."

"Coercion will be more than enough. If you disobey, I will turn you into material for my creations and ensure that you feel and are aware of every manipulation performed on your flesh. But if you do what I tell you to do, I will let you live for a while longer."

"Coercion will be more than enough. If you disobey, I will turn you into material for my creations and ensure that you feel and are aware of every manipulation performed on your flesh. But if you do what I tell you to do, I will let you live for a while longer."

"Coercion will be more than enough. If you disobey, I will turn you into material for my creations and ensure that you feel and are aware of every manipulation performed on your flesh. But if you do what I tell you to do, I will let you live for a while longer."

"Coercion will be more than enough. If you disobey, I will turn you into material for my creations and ensure that you feel and are aware of every manipulation performed on your flesh. But if you do what I tell you to do, I will let you live for a while longer."

languages.text: 「強いることに何の問題が？もし逆らうならば、私はお前を、我が創造物の材料に作り替え、その肉体に施されたあらゆる操作を感じ、認識できるようにしてやろう。だが、私の言う通りにするのならば、もう少し生かしておいてやる」
languages.original_text: "Coercion will be more than enough. If you disobey, I will turn you into material for my creations and ensure that you feel and are aware of every manipulation performed on your flesh. But if you do what I tell you to do, I will let you live for a while longer."

traits.locale_text: 「強いることに何の問題が？もし逆らうならば、私はお前を、我が創造物の材料に作り替え、その肉体に施されたあらゆる操作を感じ、認識できるようにしてやろう。だが、私の言う通りにするのならば、もう少し生かしておいてやる」

languages.text: “胁迫就完全足够了。如果你不服从我，我就会把你变成我的材料，用来创造别的东西，而且我会保留你的意识，让你亲身感受什么叫做身不由己。不过，如果你按照我的吩咐做事，我可以让多活一阵子。”
languages.original_text: "Coercion will be more than enough. If you disobey, I will turn you into material for my creations and ensure that you feel and are aware of every manipulation performed on your flesh. But if you do what I tell you to do, I will let you live for a while longer."

traits.locale_text: “胁迫就完全足够了。如果你不服从我，我就会把你变成我的材料，用来创造别的东西，而且我会保留你的意识，让你亲身感受什么叫做身不由己。不过，如果你按照我的吩咐做事，我可以让多活一阵子。”

languages.text: « La contrainte suffira. Si vous désobéissez, je ferai de vous la substance de mes prochaines créations et je veillerai à ce que vous ressentiez chaque manipulation de votre chair. Mais si vous faites ce que je dis, je vous laisserai vivre un peu plus longtemps. »
languages.original_text: "Coercion will be more than enough. If you disobey, I will turn you into material for my creations and ensure that you feel and are aware of every manipulation performed on your flesh. But if you do what I tell you to do, I will let you live for a while longer."

traits.locale_text: « La contrainte suffira. Si vous désobéissez, je ferai de vous la substance de mes prochaines créations et je veillerai à ce que vous ressentiez chaque manipulation de votre chair. Mais si vous faites ce que je dis, je vous laisserai vivre un peu plus longtemps. »

languages.text: «La coacción bastará. Si desobedeces, te convertiré en material para mis creaciones y me aseguraré de que sientes y eres consciente de cada cambio que aplique a tu carne. Mientras que si haces lo que te ordeno, te permitiré vivir más tiempo».
languages.original_text: "Coercion will be more than enough. If you disobey, I will turn you into material for my creations and ensure that you feel and are aware of every manipulation performed on your flesh. But if you do what I tell you to do, I will let you live for a while longer."

traits.locale_text: «La coacción bastará. Si desobedeces, te convertiré en material para mis creaciones y me aseguraré de que sientes y eres consciente de cada cambio que aplique a tu carne. Mientras que si haces lo que te ordeno, te permitiré vivir más tiempo».

languages.text: "Coercion wird mehr als genug sein. Wenn Ihr nicht gehorcht, verwandle ich Euch in Material für meine Kreationen und sorge dafür, dass Ihr jede Manipulation Eures Fleisches spürt und bewusst erlebt. Macht Ihr hingegen, was ich Euch sage, lasse ich Euch noch eine Weile leben."
languages.original_text: "Coercion will be more than enough. If you disobey, I will turn you into material for my creations and ensure that you feel and are aware of every manipulation performed on your flesh. But if you do what I tell you to do, I will let you live for a while longer."

traits.locale_text: "Coercion wird mehr als genug sein. Wenn Ihr nicht gehorcht, verwandle ich Euch in Material für meine Kreationen und sorge dafür, dass Ihr jede Manipulation Eures Fleisches spürt und bewusst erlebt. Macht Ihr hingegen, was ich Euch sage, lasse ich Euch noch eine Weile leben."

languages.text: "Zorlama yeterli olacaktır. İtaatsizlik edersen seni yaratımlarım için malzeme olarak kullanırım. Bedenin üzerinde yapacağım her türlü manipülasyonu yaşar ve hissedersin. Oysa sana dediklerimi yaparsan bir süre daha yaşamana izin veririm."
languages.original_text: "Coercion will be more than enough. If you disobey, I will turn you into material for my creations and ensure that you feel and are aware of every manipulation performed on your flesh. But if you do what I tell you to do, I will let you live for a while longer."

traits.locale_text: "Zorlama yeterli olacaktır. İtaatsizlik edersen seni yaratımlarım için malzeme olarak kullanırım ve bedenin üzerinde yaptığım her türlü manipülasyonu farkında olur ve hissedersin. Sana dediklerimi yaparsan ama bir süre daha yaşamana izin veririm."
